title: The Rebirth of Venus
description: The third and final volume of the Botticelli Trilogy. With the death of Lorenzo de' Medici in 1492, Florence comes under a new regime, religious, fundamentalist, severe. Tommaso the Platonist is no longer safe in the city. Should he flee, or should he go with his friends to the sermons of Girolamo Savonarola?
author: Linda Proud
